articles.title: New study predicts the masses of the largest supermassive black holes in the universe - Phys.org

articles.author: Sandi Miller | Department of Physics
articles.title: Professor Emeritus Roman Jackiw, “giant of theoretical physics,” dies at 83 - MIT News
articles.description: Eminent theoretical physicist Roman Jackiw, MIT professor emeritus of physics, died at age 83. A faculty member for more than 50 years, he made fundamental contributions to quantum field theory and discovered topological and geometric phenomena.
